title: Principles of Mobile Microlearning Platform Design and Application Strategies in the Sciences

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Course strengthening scientific problem-solving competencies for managers/leaders in flexible smartphone-based learning environments

learning_goals: Fifteen design principles for mobile microlearning platforms can be explained and applied in practice
Sequential instructional flows and interactive microcontent can be designed to solve project-based problems in science fields
Mobile learning strategies for large learner groups in BYOD environments can be developed and evaluated
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
